biotools.summary: This tutorial aims to illustrate the process of computing a conformational transition between two known structural conformations of a protein, step by step, using the BioExcel Building Blocks (biobb).

bioschemas.name: BioExcel Building Blocks tutorials: Protein Conformational Transitions
bioschemas.summary: This tutorial aims to illustrate the process of computing a conformational transition between two known structural conformations of a protein, step by step, using the BioExcel Building Blocks (biobb).
